nodes.text: The HCT-2001 Dragonboat-class Reugeot 905 freighter was used by Trandoshan hunters during the Clone Wars.
The slave ship had two braking thrusters facing forward, to aid in landing procedures. At least 12 cargo modules were located towards the stern of the ship and it was armed with a laser turret.

A Trandoshan slave ship, the Vermin-Thrax, was used to carry captives to the isolated jungle moon of Wasskah. They abducted various aliens, Jedi Padawans, and Initiates (such as Ahsoka Tano, Jinx, Kalifa, and O-Mer) and held them in cages on this ship. After the captives were brought to the moon of Wasskah and released into jungle, the hunt began.
